Job Title: Drug Delivery Device Program Manager

Location: Piscataway, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Job Description

Job Summary

The Device Program Manager is responsible for owning the day-to-day activities of Program Management of Drug Delivery Device projects. The DPM will be interacting with external vendors to define deliverables including budget and schedule and all deliverables are met. DPM will interact with internal cross-functional teams to ensure all quality, regulatory and finance related documentation is satisfied. DPM will prepare management reports of each project to provide timely progress updates.

Essential Functions


Technical owner of work streams within the development of drug delivery systems from concept design to commercial prototypes as required by the project planComplete the risk management activities to meet project timescales, device performance and quality requirementsEnsure that all project inputs and outputs are thoroughly documented, providing a robust and detailed design history filePrepare Device related Regulatory document for filing, responses to agency quires like IR, DRL, CR etc.Coordinate with RA, Quality, Marketing, and other departments to create DHF documents including Risk management documents.Coordinate with all stakeholders of the project to arrange and conduct periodic design reviews.Skilled in the use of CAD tools, ideally SolidWorksExperience of US and EU regulatory requirements for drug delivery systemsExperience with plastic design, manufacturing, and assembly


Qualifications

Education


Bachelors Degree (BA/BS) in Engineer/Mechanical Bio-medical - Required


Work Experience


5 years or more in Mid Manager/Program Manager/Med Device Industry - Required


Skills And Abilities


Design and Development of Drug Delivery Systems - AdvancedContract Manufacturing of Medical Devices - AdvancedValidation & Verification of injection mold tools & assembly machines - AdvancedRisk assessment and management - AdvancedISO standards, 21 CFR, EU MDR - Advanced


Specialized Knowledge


Specialized knowledge and management of drug delivery device or combination product devices.


About Us

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
